ca.concordia.advanceprog.elements

Class Critter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ca.concordia.advanceprog.elements.Critter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HighLevelCritter, LowLevelCritter, MediumLevelCritter

    public class Critter
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    Critter is the main moving element in the game that each critter has x and y which describes the current location or soon to be moved location
    Author:
    Shahriar Rostami
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
